readyToCreate.title: Ready to Create
readyToCreate.description: Enter your creative prompt above and watch AI transform your imagination into stunning visual art

prompts.fantasyPortrait: A mystical fantasy portrait, magical atmosphere, ethereal lighting, detailed character design, enchanted eyes
prompts.realisticPortrait: Professional headshot photography, studio lighting, sharp focus, detailed facial features, natural expression
prompts.heroicCharacter: Epic heroic character portrait, dramatic lighting, powerful stance, detailed armor or costume, inspiring presence
prompts.cyberpunkPortrait: Futuristic cyberpunk portrait, neon lighting, technological augmentations, urban setting, dystopian atmosphere
prompts.sciFiLandscape: Futuristic alien landscape, cyberpunk city, neon lights, flying vehicles, distant planets, atmospheric perspective
prompts.natureScene: Serene natural landscape, golden hour lighting, peaceful atmosphere, high detail, pristine wilderness
prompts.fantasyRealm: Magical fantasy landscape, floating islands, mystical forests, ancient ruins, ethereal atmosphere
prompts.postApocalyptic: Post-apocalyptic wasteland, abandoned buildings, dramatic sky, desolate atmosphere, survival setting
prompts.abstractArt: Abstract geometric composition, vibrant colors, dynamic shapes, modern art style, flowing forms
prompts.fluidDynamics: Liquid paint splash, fluid dynamics, swirling colors, organic patterns, smooth gradients
prompts.sacredGeometry: Sacred geometric patterns, mandala design, symmetrical composition, spiritual symbolism, intricate details
prompts.modernArchitecture: Contemporary architectural design, clean lines, glass and steel, minimalist aesthetic, urban environment
prompts.ancientTemple: Ancient temple architecture, ornate carvings, historical stonework, mystical atmosphere, cultural heritage
prompts.futuristicBuilding: Futuristic architectural structure, innovative design, advanced materials, sci-fi cityscape, high-tech aesthetic
prompts.productShot: Professional product photography, clean white background, studio lighting, commercial quality, detailed textures
prompts.vintageStillLife: Classic still life arrangement, vintage objects, warm lighting, artistic composition, nostalgic atmosphere
prompts.magicalArtifact: Enchanted magical artifact, glowing runes, mystical energy, fantasy item, detailed craftsmanship
prompts.wildlifePortrait: Majestic wildlife animal portrait, natural habitat, detailed fur or feathers, expressive eyes, nature photography
prompts.mythicalCreature: Legendary mythical creature, dragon or phoenix, magical powers, fantasy setting, epic scale
prompts.cutePet: Adorable pet portrait, playful expression, soft lighting, cozy domestic setting, heartwarming moment
prompts.epicBattle: Dynamic battle scene, warriors in combat, dramatic action, epic scale, cinematic composition
prompts.peacefulMoment: Tranquil peaceful scene, calm atmosphere, gentle lighting, serene mood, contemplative setting

history.expiredMessage: This image has expired and will be deleted soon

deletion.imageWarning: Images are automatically deleted after 14 days to manage storage. Download images you want to keep permanently.
deletion.videoWarning: Videos are automatically deleted after 14 days to manage storage. Download videos you want to keep permanently.
deletion.extensionInfoImages: Regular users can extend storage up to 3 times (7 days each)
deletion.extensionInfoVideos: Regular users can extend storage up to 1 time (7 days extra)

warnings.videoProcessingMessage: Video processing typically takes 2-5 minutes. Please be patient while we create your video.
warnings.largeDimensions: Large dimensions may take longer to generate
warnings.autoDeleteionMessage: Videos are automatically deleted after 14 days to manage storage. Download videos you want to keep permanently.
warnings.extensionInfo: Regular users can extend storage up to 1 time (7 days extra)
